recipesJson.name: SIMPLE
recipesJson.author: JOE_ROOTS
recipesJson.description:
So I wanted to create a simple cheap and delicious strawberry and cream and this is it.

Equal amount of tpa strawberry ripe and liquid barn vanilla ice cream.

Add your prefered sweetener

Your welcome ðŸ˜‰ðŸ˜‹

reviews.text: Love this recipe! Simple straight forward strawberry cream saver candy. Mixed it with .5% super sweet and it was perfect as a snv but as the recipe states 7 days is when the magic happens.
This is delicious! To me this tastes like a strawberry cream saver candy. Thanks for this!
